subject: Coaches and Managers
World Cup 2018 (Soccer)

World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann’s new contract runs through the 2018 World Cup cycle and makes him U.S. Soccer’s technical director as well as the men’s national team coach.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann’s new contract runs through the 2018 World Cup cycle and makes him U.S. Soccer’s technical director as well as the men’s national team coach.
